title: An Oil Slick Cycling Jacket? The Ale Guscio Iridescent Reflective jacket shines at night
content:
The Ale Bike Guscio Iridescent Reflective Cycling Jacket is likely to turn more than a few heads this winter, an excellent feature for the regular commuter cyclist who needs to be seen to be safe. Love it or hate it, oil slick is now an actual look across the cycling world, featured on everything from

The post An Oil Slick Cycling Jacket? The Ale Guscio Iridescent Reflective jacket shines at night appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
